title: Administrative Staff Position/Customer Relations Manager
job_overview:
Administrative Staff Position/Customer Relations Manager

Are you a great communicator with excellent English skills? Are you detail-oriented and eager to learn? If so, we want YOU to join our team! 

This is a full-time position, requiring availability from 9 am to 5 pm EST, Monday to Friday. 

Starting salary of $4/hour, subject to a 90-day performance review for salary increase.

Quarterly (90 day) Salary Increases: based on work performance meeting minimum standards 

PTO ( Paid Time Off): Holiday schedule for Paid time off will be disclosed, with 14 Days PTO/year available for Full Time Employees 


What You'll Do:
- Make phone calls and communicate with customers via Go High Level
- Solve customer problems with a professional and friendly approach
- Keep accurate records and follow company processes via Click Up

What Weâ€™re Looking For:
- Excellent American accent and communication skills
- Must have a noise-canceling microphone/headset
- Minimum internet speed of 50 Mbps
- Reliable backup internet connection
- Prior experience or knowledge of Go High Level is a plus.
- Ability to work effectively in a team environment
- Strong leadership skills are preferred
- More than 2 years of customer support experience is a plus
- On Camera 8 hours a day

Training is provided, so if you're motivated and ready to develop new skills, apply now!

If you're interested and believe you have what it takes to be part of our team, we invite you to fill out the form linked below and to submit a 2 minute introductory video introducing yourself and explaining why you would be an excellent fit for the role. Only applicants who have submitted a video will be considered for the position.
